entry.title: $2450 // *No Fee + 1 Month Free* Awesome Deal For This Renovated 1-BR
entry.content:
By Owner No Fee

Located on East 78th in the Upper East Side. Conveniently steps away from train links, shopping, cafés, restaurants, gyms, and more!

A truly beautiful, spacious, and newly renovated 1-BR apartment. Comes with gorgeous hardwood floors, bath with marble finishes, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. This unit has plenty of space for a queen sized bed, couches, and tables. Plenty of closet space. In a great area, come get it while it lasts! Looking for a 24 month lease.

The application process is easy!

For more information and a quick showing, contact Thomas at show contact info
